title: ** RENT NOW BUY LATER- RENT TO OWN**
posting_body: The Rent to Own Program is a great option if you:
• Want to live in a single-family home, in a great community with quality schools
• Are a first-time homebuyer who’s cautious about buying a home now, but may want to buy in the future
• Are a home seeker in the process of relocating but aren’t sure where you want to settle down
• Can’t obtain a mortgage right now
• Simply want to live in a quality home
Contact me today for more information and details about the program:
Lateefah Mathews, Realtor®
Lease Purchase Specialist
REAL BROKER LLC
Basic Requirements to Qualify for the Program:
-$50,000+ annual household income
-600+ MINIMUM credit score (No Exceptions At All!)
-Self-employment, SSI, Child support, VA, accepted
-Stable employment
-No evictions within the last year
-No felony convictions within the last 4 years
-No pending bankruptcy
-No Credit Impact to you at all!
-LOW APPLICATION FEE...
NO CREDIT IMPACT...!
Contact me today for more information and details about the program:

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
